long_description: Perfect for backcountry gourmets, the MSR Base 2 pot set equips you with the cookware needed to create scrumptious meals. Includes a 2.5-liter pot, a 1.5-liter pot, 1 strainer lid, Packtowl(TM) and 1 pot handle. Aluminum pots feature a Teflon(R) nonstick coating that cleans up easily after cooking. Brushed aluminum lid fits both pots and features an integrated strainer to eliminate the hassle of draining water from noodles or steamed vegetables. Talon(TM) pot handle attaches to and removes from both pots via exterior brackets, ensuring you don't scratch the inner surface.
short_description: Perfect for backcountry gourmets, the MSR Base 2 pot set equips you with the cookware needed to create scrumptious meals.
